Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Requires child protective services to orally and in writing disclose certain information to parents and caretakers who are the subject of a child protective services investigation
Summary: Requires child protective services to orally and in writing disclose certain information to parents and caretakers who are the subject of a child protective services investigation; requires such oral and written disclosure to contain certain information regarding the rights of the person under investigation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring child protective services to disclose certain information to parents and caretakers who are the subject of a child protective services investigation
